amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Long Range Standoff Weapon by $75,802,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 261 (Roll no. 309).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 159 - 261 (Roll no. 309).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Quigley.
